description: This file defines an interface class 'IOmiProxy' within the 'omi' namespace for a proxy to communicate with an omi_dbus_api. It declares methods for mounting/unmounting encrypted bundles and managing error listeners, serving as an abstraction layer for crypto container operations and signal handling.

classes.name: IOmiProxy
classes.description: An interface class providing abstractions for mounting/unmounting crypted containers and registering/unregistering error listeners.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted container given its ID, filesystem path, and config, returning the decrypted bundle path.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts a crypted container identified by its ID.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers an error listener callback and returns a listener ID.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered error listener.

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
